entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
